text: Tell me everything that you see going on in the picture. Just tell me what's happening there. Well, one thing this boy's on the stool getting cookies. And the stool's about to fall. And the little girl's reaching for some cookies. She got her finger at her mouth. Mother's drying dishes and water's running over. She got a, and she's drying dishes and water's running over. She's standing in the water. There's a sink there. Wave epidemic
